description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Follow Sam, a gritty Nomad, who has a chance encounter with a certain Command Ship Operator.  While the Operator is nowhere to be seen, Sam fights for his life to repay a debt to his expired crew.  He has his work cut out for him, but with nothing to live for, Sam is on a journey for Retribution...
